experience in government ethics; ethics counseling and training; corporate finance; securities law; employment law; and criminal law

legally registered vehicle and a valid driver’s license

key_responsibilities: answering phones
greeting constituents and visitors

experience in government ethics; criminal law; employment law; civil litigation; administrative investigations and adjudications; depositions; and financial accounting

developing strong relationships with local and national reporters

overseeing a robust and aggressive online communications program

key_responsibilities: writing a broad array of speeches
drafting press releases and op-eds
maintaining relationships with local and national press
producing a weekly newsletter
managing all digital accounts

ability to work well with a team in a small, fast-paced environment

office: Rep. Elijah Cummings, the Committee on Oversight and Reform

strategizing, developing, and implementing district communications and outreach plan

excellent oral and written communication skills
thorough knowledge of the legislative process

performing other duties as necessary

arranging travel

key_responsibilities: managing the legislative team
advancing the Member’s legislative agenda and monitoring legislative developments
